attributes.action: give peodophiles a proper life sentence when they are sentenced to it
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i went to the sentencing of my brother who was convicted of abusing my 7 year old daughter and was given a life sentence of 11 years but could get out in 5 and a half, what sort of life sentence is that, they are not going to change, next time they will try to be a bit more cleverer.
they should never be allowed out to mix with innocent lives again, they blame it on them having that done to them.
stop it now by locking them away untill they die, they dont deserve a life if they can do that to a child. i believe strongly in this and want to try and prevent any other children being hurt like this again.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
